page.title: 02Four Oaks Employment.
page.content: There is no large scale employer in this residential district.What local employmenmt there is is confined to those service industries that are necessary to maintain the fabric of urban life.There is only one medium sized factory which is associated with a major Birmingham manufacturer connected with the car industry.In keeping with current employment trends,this firm is contracting its activities.Redundancy and unemployment have had their effects and about 15% of the workforce is unemployed. Many school leavers have been unable to find jobs.Most young people are engaged on Youth Employment Schemes. Some families struggle to maintain a previous standard of living. Usually unsuccessfully,once savings have been used up. However many people attempt to keep up appearances.
